text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>Bey Herrn Daniel Haag dem Buchbinder sind zu verkauffen: <BIBL><TITLE>Steiners Fest-Gedancken</TITLE> in <FORMAT>Fol.</FORMAT> <PRICE>2. fl. 24. kr.</PRICE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Neues und vollkommenes Gebettbuch</TITLE> in <FORMAT>groß 8vo.</FORMAT> von <AUTHOR>Pfarrer Stehelin</AUTHOR> in <PLACE>St. Gallen</PLACE>, ohngebunden <PRICE>46. kr.</PRICE>; gebunden in Leder und Schlotz <PRICE>fl. 1. 10. kr.</PRICE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Memoires de Rochester</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> ohngebunden <PRICE>6. Batzen;</PRICE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Maupertuis</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Anfang der Geographie</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PRICE>6. kr.</PRICE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Messung des Meridians Gradus</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PRICE>12. Batzen;</PRICE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Satura pars II.</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PRICE>18. kr.</PRICE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Gespräch von den Würmen welche bey Anfang dieses Jahrs auf dem Schnee gefunden worden</TITLE> <PRICE>8. Rappen,</PRICE> und viele andere mehr, davon der Bericht bey Ihme zu vernemmen.</BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":8,"explanation":"1. Fixed inconsistent tag usage: Changed <PRIZE> to <PRICE> for consistency. 2. Corrected malformed Unicode characters in text content (e.g., \\u221a\\u00fc to 'ß'). 3. Closed unclosed <BIBL> tag for 'Memoires de Rochester'. 4. Ensured proper nesting of all <BIBL> elements. 5. Fixed encoding issues in format descriptions (e.g., '8v\\u221a\\u2264' to '8vo.'). 6. Removed stray Unicode characters (e.g., '\\u221a\\u2020') that were not part of the actual content. 7. Corrected the spelling of 'Anf\\u221a\\u00a7ng' to 'Anfang'. 8. Corrected 'Gespr\\u221a\\u00a7ch' to 'Gespräch' and 'W\\u221a\\u00barmen' to 'Würmen'."}

parsed.fixed_xml: <ITEM>Bey Herrn Daniel Haag dem Buchbinder sind zu verkauffen: <BIBL><TITLE>Steiners Fest-Gedancken</TITLE> in <FORMAT>Fol.</FORMAT> <PRICE>2. fl. 24. kr.</PRICE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Neues und vollkommenes Gebettbuch</TITLE> in <FORMAT>groß 8vo.</FORMAT> von <AUTHOR>Pfarrer Stehelin</AUTHOR> in <PLACE>St. Gallen</PLACE>, ohngebunden <PRICE>46. kr.</PRICE>; gebunden in Leder und Schlotz <PRICE>fl. 1. 10. kr.</PRICE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Memoires de Rochester</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> ohngebunden <PRICE>6. Batzen;</PRICE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Maupertuis</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Anfang der Geographie</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PRICE>6. kr.</PRICE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Messung des Meridians Gradus</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PRICE>12. Batzen;</PRICE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Satura pars II.</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PRICE>18. kr.</PRICE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Gespräch von den Würmen welche bey Anfang dieses Jahrs auf dem Schnee gefunden worden</TITLE> <PRICE>8. Rappen,</PRICE> und viele andere mehr, davon der Bericht bey Ihme zu vernemmen.</BIBL></ITEM>
parsed.explanation: 1. Fixed inconsistent tag usage: Changed <PRIZE> to <PRICE> for consistency. 2. Corrected malformed Unicode characters in text content (e.g., \u221a\u00fc to 'ß'). 3. Closed unclosed <BIBL> tag for 'Memoires de Rochester'. 4. Ensured proper nesting of all <BIBL> elements. 5. Fixed encoding issues in format descriptions (e.g., '8v\u221a\u2264' to '8vo.'). 6. Removed stray Unicode characters (e.g., '\u221a\u2020') that were not part of the actual content. 7. Corrected the spelling of 'Anf\u221a\u00a7ng' to 'Anfang'. 8. Corrected 'Gespr\u221a\u00a7ch' to 'Gespräch' and 'W\u221a\u00barmen' to 'Würmen'.
